Entries.RSV_GH1: I can't wait to plant some crops inside the Greenhouse.#$b#There's also a great echo in here for sing...$h#$b#...for talking.$u
Entries.keahi_prank: Hey, uhm, @?#$b#You seem to be really stinky.$s#$b#Uhm, I hope that wasn't rude.$s
@? You're really smelly.$s#$b#Can you take a shower before socializing?$s
Uhmm... @? Did you forget to take a shower?$s

Entries.RSV_GH1: Teehee, I can make my own little fairytale garden inside the Greenhouse.$h#$b#Huh?#$b#What?$u#$b#N-no, you heard nothing!$a
Entries.keahi_prank: What's that pungent smell?$a#$b#Oh! It's you!#$b#Please conform to societal hygiene standards!$a
%Ysabelle sniffs you before she almost throws up. #$b#Uh, @? I advise you take a shower immediately.$a
What's that smell?$a#$b#Oh! It's coming from you!$u#$b#Uhmm... hard work does make one sweaty sometimes, right?$s#$b#But @, I think you jumped the whale.$s

Entries.RSV_GH1: Oh wow! A Greenhouse! This is exciting!$h#$b#I can plant exotic crops from all over the valley here!$h#$b#Maybe even Starfruit!$h
Entries.keahi_prank: Oh wow, what's that smell!?$a#$b#I'm gonna vomit!$s
Hey @? Is that odor coming from you?$s#$b#Uhm, did you step on something?$s
%Philip looks like he's going to be sick.$u#$b#What's that supernatural smell?$u
Oh... that smell is making me dizzy.$s#$b#Where is that odor coming from!?$a
You smell like sulphur.#$b#Perhaps you should bathe yourself more often, @.
Is that smell coming from you?$u#$b#Oh Yoba, release me from this pungent smell!$s
Bah! You smell like week-old goat milk!$a#$b#Get away from me!$a
Even with this old nose, I can still say that there's something really wrong with that smell.$s
You smell like a swamp spirit.#$b#Please leave.$h
Kiwi think you smell!$s#$b#Don't come close or Kiwi stab!#a

Entries.RSV_GH1: The ones who have personal plots in the first Greenhouse besides you are Jeric, Alissa, Olga, and Maddie.#$b#I'm quite curious about Maddie's intentions with the Greenhouse, though.#$b#Either way, I'm glad it's being used to the fullest extent.$h
Entries.keahi_prank: Do you smell it?$u#$b#That smell.$a#$b#A kind of smelly smell.$s#$b#The smelly smell that smells... smelly.$s
@, dear...#$b#You might want to take a shower.$s

Entries.RSV_GH1: I'll be growing lots of flowers inside the Greenhouse!$h#$b#Thank Yoba, my floral dreams will finally come true!$h
Entries.keahi_prank: Oh no, he's done it again!$a#$b#Keahi is really going to meet his maker today!$a
Ah, you smell like the Pua Kupapau.$h#$b#A flower known for its pungent aroma.#$b#It's also known as the corpse flower because of the putrid smell.
Oh no! Not in my hotel you don't!$a#$b#Go take a bath first!$a
Ooohh! That STINKS!$h#$b#You REALLY should take a bath, @.$4

Entries.keahi_sorry: Teehee < Keahi baked me a cake!$h
Entries.keahi_nosorry: Hmph! That stupid Keahi!$a#$b# He didn't even bother to say sorry.$s
Entries.keahi_prank: Hey @$u#$b#You're really REALLY stinky!$h
Ew!$s#$b#You smell like Aunt Marnie's cows!$s
Hey! What's that smell?#$b#AHHH, MY NOSE IS DYING!$s
You should take a bath.#$b#You kind of smell.
What's that smell!?$s#$b#It smells evil!$s
Oh my.$s#$b#It smells like the month-old pizza I found in Gus' cellar.$s
You stink!$a#$b#Don't come near me!$a
I think it's good to be one with nature and all @...#$b#But I think you're taking it a bit too far by not taking a bath.$s
That smell is NOT healthy!$s
Is that smell coming from you, @?$s#$b#Oh, uhm...#$b#%Penny starts walking away slowly.
%Alex is pinching his nose.#$b#You okay there, @?$s
Oh my, You smell quite... exotic.$s#$b#Perhaps a dip in the water could clear this aroma?$s
That smell...#$b#Do you have a medical issue?$s#$b#It's okay, you know...#$b#I won't judge you as a medical practitioner.
Woah! You smell that?!$a#$b#Where's that coming from!? It's really gross!$s
Did you forget to take a bath or something, @?
Don't come near me with that smell!$a#$b#Take a bath.$a
Did you just do some aerobics?#$b# It's pretty much customary to take a shower after, you know...$s
It's not my business to tell you this.#$b#But you may have forgotten to take a shower today.$s
That smell... I know this smell.#$b#It's from a local species of stink bug found in the mountains.#$b#Did you... sit on it?
Oh dear, that smells horrible!$s
Your smell is bothering me!#$b#Please leave my house!$a
Uh, @? Can you get out of my Saloon?$s#$b#You smell horrible!$s
Oh no, don't tell me. Was it Vincent or Keahi?#$b#Or was it both of them!?$s#$b#I think one of them pranked you...$s
Gross. Do you ever shower?$a
Listen, @. Working hard is good, but I think you should learn to shower and relax once in a while.$s#$b#You're stinking up the town.$s
Ouch, got hit by the Ridgeside stink bug, huh?#$b#Been there, done that.#$b#Tt was a nightmare to get off.#$b#Took me hours of scrubbing.$s
What's that smell? That can't be any of my cows!$s#$b#Uhm, @? Is that you?$s
What in Yoba's name is that smell? It's horrible!$s#$b#You make me wish I had no nose!$a
That smell is bad for business.$s#$b#I suggest you come back after you've taken a shower, @.$s
What's that smell? Is it you?$s#$b#No judgement here! But you really need to take a bath, @.
Ah, it smells like the Ridgeside stink bug.$h#$b#Pungent? Yes.#$b#But it makes me miss the valley.$s
That smell would scare all the fish away.#$b#You need to take a bath, @.
That smell is evil!$a#$b#Begone!$a
